website_summaries.verdict: For nostalgic viewers of the original Mister Rogers series, this magnetic set of interchangeable clothing and props has great appeal.
pros: Set contains numerous magnetic costume pieces
Also includes puppet characters and neighborhood trolley
cons: Does not contain as many pieces as some expected

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and great product
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several things off of Amazon from the Unemployed Philosopers Guild and they always ship promptly, I have never had issue with damages, and they always make sure I am satisfied with my purchase. This is the second time I ordered this because I lost almost all of his clothes in a move. I love it. I am huge Mr. Rogers fan and this is so much fun. Sturdy. Some little pieces that can get lost so beware if you have pets or small children. Other than that, if it went beyond five stars, I would select higher.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Spann

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mr. Rogers fans
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My 2-year-old daughter wants to take Mr. Rogers everywhere with her.
customer_reviews.author: C2

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law asked for several items relating to Mister Rogers, this was one of her requests, but I don't know if she likes it or not, it has not been opened yet!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Virelli

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old and I both love this set. She feeds the fish and dresses Mr. Rogers in the different accompanying outfits. It makes me smile every time I see the sweet neighbor from my childhood on the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Love it! We purchased this to use in an elementary SPED room and it's a hit. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My students love it!
customer_reviews.text: Although most of my high school students are unaware of who Mr. Rogers is/was, they enjoy using the magnets when they have some down time. I'm happy with this fun purchase!
customer_reviews.author: N. Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend who adores Mr Rogers. It was a hit! She loves it! He has a prime spot on her fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must-buy if you grew up watching Mr. Rogers
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to love about a magnetic dress-up Mr. Rogers. Many outfit choices and characters from the land of make believe. At least while I shelter in place, I can look forward to changing his cardigan and hand puppet every morning. And don’t forget to feed the fish.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Yankee Swap gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a yankee swap gift. It was packaged well, and was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This set did not include that much and I found it to be a little pricey for the quality and contents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for adult daughter to hang on file cabinet in her office. It’s a huge nostalgic hit
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Arlene R. Schiek

customer_reviews.title: Great memory bump for adult children
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to buy fun gifts for middle-aged adult children? Consider these fridge-suitable play sets.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who's a Mister Rogers fan this is a fun thing to have. Great quality magnets. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S.

customer_reviews.title: Much loved
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the recipient loves it. It's clever and provides a little bit of ongoing Mr. Rogers fun.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Cute but over priced
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! A little pricey for it to just be magnets, new condition. I am overall pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Abby S.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are easy to handle & view
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions of pieces makes this a good activity for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Mr. Rogers!!! You can dress him up in different sweaters and hats or with different puppets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: Very well made,nostalgic and what a great find, I am always pleased when dealing with this company,
customer_reviews.author: JB Ny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Sister in law love this for her work office. Brightens up her and her co-worker's day :)
customer_reviews.author: Ethan and Catie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Mister Rogers?! Great magnets and fun to have.
customer_reviews.author: K. Creek

customer_reviews.title: UPG does it again!
customer_reviews.text: The Unemployed Philosophers Guild knows just what I need: I love Mr. Rogers, and I'm also easily amused. In my office, Mr. Rogers now has pride of place on my white board, right next to Sigmund Freud and Albert Einstein.
customer_reviews.author: Toni H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Provides a dose of comfort and reassurance each time I reach for a snack
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old son loved receiving this for Christmas and our whole family will ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 3.5 year old son loved receiving this for Christmas and our whole family will enjoy it on the refrigerator for the indefinite future : )
customer_reviews.author: BoomBamBoom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My two year old is loving this magnet set!!!!!!!! So cute!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MusicOdin

customer_reviews.title: A1 product.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Very cool magnetic mr rogers clothes, shoes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Hello, Neighbor
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. My only complaint is that his sweaters won't stick on when he's wearing a tie. I do also think that the neighborhood fold out could have been magnetic, a feature that most magnetic sets and Colorforms come with. Other than that, it's a beautiful day in the neighborhood with this Mister Rogers magnetic doll set.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian1

product_meta.title: The Unemployed Philosophers Guild Hello Neighbor - Mister Rogers Magnetic Dress Up Play Set
feature_bullets: Mix and Match Mr. Rogers on your fridge.
Magnet set includes two sheets of accessories, measuring approximately 7.5" x 12" each.
Dozens of pieces for nearly limitless options on your refrigerator, or any other magnetic surface. This set does not include a magnetic board.
Quirky, fun, educational, and makes a great funny gift.
Click on the link to our store page near the product title to see more smart and clever gifts. UPG truly has presents of mind.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
